channel.title: CVE Feed for Teimas Global -- Teixo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Teimas Global -- Teixo

item.title: CVE-2024-3654|2024-04-19T12:38:48.895Z -- Teimas Global -- Teixo
item.description: An XSS vulnerability has been found in Teimas Global's Teixo, version 1.42.42-stable. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a specially crafted JavaScript payload via the "seconds" parameter in the program's URL, resulting in a possible takeover of a registered user's session.
